item.title: Academic Office closure
item.description: The Academic Office of the Faculty of Science and Technology will be close from August 8, 2022 until August 26, 2022.

item.title: Academic Office closure
item.description: The Academic Office of the Faculty of Agricultural and Food Sciences will be close from August 8, 2022 until August 19, 2022.

item.title: Academic Office closure
item.description: The Academic Office of the Faculty of Pharmacy will be close from August 16, 2022 until August 26, 2022.

item.title: Calls for research awards
item.description:
The Carlo Erba Foundation, in collaboration with KEDRION, announces the prizes:
¬∑ Cecilia Cioffrese
¬∑ Guelfo Marcucci
¬∑ Fabrizio Fabbrizzi

reserved for graduates in Medicine and Surgery, Biological Sciences, Pharmacy, Pharmaceutical Chemistry and Technology, Chemistry and other biomedical disciplines.
Calls are available at Study Awards section.

item.title: Giulio Andreolli Award ‚ÄúFare Paesaggio‚Äù
item.description:
The Landscape Observatory of the Autonomous Province of Trento has established the Giulio Andreolli Triennial Award ‚ÄúFare Paesaggio‚Äù to support the protection and management of the Alpine landscape.
The deadline for submitting applications is 30 September 2022.
Notice and information are available in the Study Awards section

item.title: Summer closure of Faculty offices
item.description:
Please be informed that the Faculty of Economic, Political and Social Sciences will be closed on the following days:
- 6 to 20 August
- 27 August
The Faculty will be open 1 to 5 August and 22 to 26 August, from 8 am to 5 pm.

item.title: SUSPENSION OF SERVICES - AUGUST 2022
item.description:
Cosp - Disability and Sld Services will be available until Friday 5 August 2022.
Services will resume regularly on Monday 22 August.
Phone and mail support services will be suspended from 8 to 19 August.

item.title: SPECIAL ADVANCED ENGLISH/ANGLO-AMERICAN/BASIC and ADVANCED FRENCH/ BASIC and ADVANCED SPANISH/BASIC and ADVANCED GERMAN TEST SESSION DEDICATED TO SOON-TO-BE GRADUATES IN THE WINTER SESSION
item.description: The SLAM Centre is running a special advanced English/Anglo-American/basic and advanced French/ basic and advanced Spanish/basic and advanced German test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the Autumn session. The test is being held in person in room 700, 46, G. Colombo street ‚Äì Milan - on 2nd November 2022.

item.title: DILS-PG exams (I and II level), 23 September 2022
item.description:
Registration is open for DILS-PG exams (I and II level) on 23 September 2022. Registration deadline is 6 September 2022.
For further information as well as to sign up and pay, please refer to the relevant notice.


üìÑ DILS-PG (I and II) call for registrations

item.title: Call for Research Grant SITA 2022
item.description:
The Italian Society of Anti-Infectious Therapy announces a competition for the award of a Research Grant lasting one year.
Notice and further information are available in the Study Awards section.

item.title: CELI i exams (A2 and B1), 21 september 2022
item.description:
Registration is open for CELI i exams (level A2 and B1) on 21 September 2022. Registration deadline is 11 August 2022.
For further information as well as to sign up and pay, please refer to the relevant notice.


üìÑ CELI i A2 and B1 call for registrations

See the notice in details and read the Protocols.
